materials.raw_text: Co: 120 g, Eu: 10 g, P: 70 g, Zr: 10 g

sourcing.instructions: Co (Cobalt powder): Available from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces.
steps: Co (Cobalt powder): Available from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces.
1. Measure out 120 g of Co, 10 g of Eu, 70 g of P, and 10 g of Zr using a precise scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 120 g of Co, 10 g of Eu, 70 g of P, and 10 g of Zr using a precise scale.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible.
